name: Spoiler
0:
”Alexa open movie spoiler”
”Alexa ask movie spoiler to ruin the ending of Planet of the Apes”
”Alexa ask movie spoiler to reveal a movie ending”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: movie spoiler
des: Annoying family member or friend hogging the TV? Get them out of there by threatening to spoil the show or movie's ending with Spoiler! Just say 'Alexa, open movie spoiler' to open the app. You can spoil a specific movie by asking Alexa to ruin the ending of (for example) Planet of the Apes. Or just say 'reveal a movie ending' and have Alexa choose for extra tension and fun. With new movies being added regularly, you can now use Alexa as a wonderful weapon to encourage sharing of the TV!
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
